issue.title: [C++] Expand min_max/hash_min_max type support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13758](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13758). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should support strings and ensure date/time/duration types are tested. I don't think any nested type is in scope.
